hero.welcome: Welcome to Muszynova! Food & Fun to discover on

about.header: Sport and Fun for young and old at a nOvy level
about.text: Is there a facility where everyone can be themselves and spend time the way they like? This was our idea when we designed Muszynova. To make everyone feel comfortable. With the youngest, teenagers and adults, families and singles, visitors and residents and organized groups in mind, our Recreation and Sports Park was created. We open the door to entertainment and activity at a new level of quality.

restaurant.header2: We Focus on New Quality, Rediscovering Beskid Flavors in a Fresh Way
restaurant.text: A restaurant offering healthy and light cuisine. A concise menu with regional accents brings Beskid flavors closer. Light? Yes! Comforting? We‚Äôre no strangers to pizza either. Something nice for everyone‚Äîwe cater to kids, teens, and adults alike, inviting you for a drink.

item1.text: We promote the flavors of Beskid cuisine. We rediscover them anew, adding a modern twist.

item2.text: We think of the little ones, ensuring they enjoy their time with us. Happy kids are more eager to eat. Favorite fries? Why not sweet potato fries? We delight taste buds and teach healthy habits. To your health!

item3.text: Delicious food, healthier choices, and a cozy atmosphere. Pleasure rediscovered anew, not just in dining but also in enjoying a beautiful, loft-style interior.

item4.text: Pizza can be a healthier option with whole-grain flour. Don‚Äôt just eat‚Äîsavor and nourish yourself with us.

item5.text: Great coffee, a touch of alcohol, a light salad, or a delightful piece of homemade dessert? The perfect spot to relax with a book or spend a pleasant evening with a loved one.

item6.text: A separate room for hosting celebrations with attractions for the youngest guests. Adults can chat at the table while kids‚Ä¶ we promise food & fun for everyone.

aboutus.text: Muszynova ‚Äì the name is a creative blend of the location 'Muszyna' and the word 'modern' in an international spelling, as we are open to everyone. It‚Äôs a promise, an invitation to rediscover the well-known resort in a 'new' way. In a fresh edition, with a new standard, for both young and old, we welcome local residents and tourists, individually or in groups. Active, delicious, uncompromising ‚Äì that‚Äôs our new approach. A modern park and restaurant invite you to spend time in Muszyna differently, the way you like it. Rediscover the world of food and fun, surrounded by the beautiful nature of the Beskid SƒÖdecki region.

cards.text: Muszyna is a well-known and beloved spa town that has been developing dynamically in recent years, attracting tourists from all over the world. This charming resort, nestled in the Beskid SƒÖdecki region, captivates with its nature and numerous attractions, including sensory gardens, historic landmarks, mountain and cycling trails, as well as mineral water springs.

card1.text: In peace, with a view of green forests, right by the trail, with the distant sound of the Poprad River. That‚Äôs how you‚Äôll spend your time with us ‚Äì a new quality of interiors, paired with the beautiful surroundings of the Beskid region.

card2.text: A concise menu in a modern style with a Beskid touch. Light, nourishing, for kids and adults alike. Delicious coffee, drinks, and for kids, familiar favorites like pizza and desserts in a healthier version. With us, you can also host celebrations with attractions.

card3.text: Active leisure time in a new way, with fun. We encourage movement from an early age and are well-prepared for it. Four modernly equipped activity zones with facilities await professional athletes, juniors, families, and individual users.

park.text: For us, activity means variety. So that everyone can enjoy it, spend their time well, however they like, regardless of skill level or sports discipline. We‚Äôre ready for both fun and intense workouts ‚Äì for the young and old, amateurs and professionals. Professional equipment, modern facilities in a beautiful interior ‚Äì all of this awaits you at Muszynova. Come and discover!

cards.text: Muszyna is a well-known and beloved spa town that has been developing dynamically in recent years, attracting tourists from all over the world. This charming resort, nestled in the Beskid SƒÖdecki region, captivates with its nature and numerous attractions, including sensory gardens, historic landmarks, mountain and cycling trails, as well as mineral water springs.

card1.text: With a certified, multi-layered Gerflor Teraflex sports surface. We invite you to play team sports: indoor football, volleyball, basketball, handball, badminton, as well as gymnastics.

card2.text: Equipped with two bowling lanes. We‚Äôve also included a relaxation area in the bowling room for users waiting to start their game.

card3.text: Designed for both amateurs and professionals. Our structure is a modern space with geometric shapes and protrusions, covering 90 m¬≤. The wall‚Äôs size allows three people to use it simultaneously, featuring 6 top-rope belay points and 18 individual belay points.

card4.text: Equipped with a play structure where children can enjoy numerous attractions: mazes, tunnels, ladders, a slide, and ball pits. Additionally, the playroom has a dedicated toddler area with soft poufs, a ball pit, and manipulative-sensory boards, allowing the youngest to both play and learn.

card5.text: Built in accordance with WSF (World Squash Federation) guidelines. The courts are designed for both team competitions and relaxation through individual training.

card6.text: With a diverse range of bikes and accessories for children and adults who prefer spending time outdoors. You‚Äôll find men‚Äôs, women‚Äôs, and children‚Äôs bikes, as well as essential gear for safe riding.

card7.text: Equipped with two tables for a favorite activity of both young and old ‚Äì the popular game of ping pong. This attraction is suitable for people of all ages.

card8.text: Allows for a comprehensive circuit training session. You‚Äôll find high-quality, certified, and safe equipment. The cardio zone includes treadmills, electromagnetic training bikes, rowing machines, elliptical trainers, and steppers.

card9.text: The fitness room enables comprehensive circuit and cardio training. Equipped with treadmills, electromagnetic training bikes, rowing machines, elliptical trainers, and steppers ‚Äì all for your fitness and health.

card10.text: Equipped with a PlayStation console and a virtual reality (VR) system, the multimedia room is a place where gamers can immerse themselves in fascinating virtual worlds. Whether someone prefers fast-paced action games or exploratory VR adventures, our room offers complete freedom of entertainment choice.

gym.text1: If you want to effectively improve your fitness and achieve your goals with the support of qualified staff, our gym in Muszyna is the perfect place for you.
gym.text2: You‚Äôll find high-quality equipment ‚Äì certified and safe for users. Depending on your training plan and preferences, we offer a free weights zone, a machines zone, and a cardio zone.

cards.text: We provide access to modern equipment and employ experienced trainers who are ready to tailor a training plan specifically to your needs. Thanks to this personalized approach and our staff‚Äôs expertise, you‚Äôll easily achieve your desired results. We believe that together we can create a plan that meets your expectations and motivates you to train regularly while maintaining a healthy lifestyle.

card1.text: If you‚Äôre unsure how to start, our experienced trainers will conduct a consultation with you, thoroughly analyzing your goals, training history, and any physical limitations. They‚Äôll show you how to properly use all the available equipment.

card2.text: Our trainers can create a personalized training plan tailored to your individual needs and goals. They‚Äôll take a comprehensive approach, considering both your current abilities and fitness aspirations, so you can achieve optimal results.

card3.text: We also offer personal training sessions, during which a trainer will personally explain how to perform each exercise correctly. With this personalized approach, your training will become even more effective, and you‚Äôll receive detailed guidance on technique, intensity, and progression.

fitness.text1: Fitness classes at Muszynova Park were created with health, good condition, and the joy of physical activity in mind. Regardless of your skill level, age, or training goals, we have something for everyone.
fitness.text2: Our instructors are ready to guide you through various forms of activity, from high-intensity, energetic sessions to static, relaxing Pilates classes.

cards.text: Our fitness instructors offer workouts that vary in intensity, use of additional weights, or other equipment. Depending on whether you want to improve your endurance or focus on building and strengthening muscles, you can choose the type of training yourself. Beyond burning calories and overall body strengthening, fitness is above all about having fun!

card1.text: We invite the youngest to discover the joy of movement and a healthy lifestyle together at Muszynova. Our classes for children develop physical fitness and foster positive habits that will benefit their health and condition in the future.

card2.text: For our adult participants, Muszynova offers a variety of fitness classes tailored to different skill levels, helping you maintain good physical shape while also providing a moment of relaxation and escape from daily stress.

card3.text: Our experienced personal trainers work with each client, tailoring a training plan to their individual needs, skills, and ambitions. Individual training allows you to focus on specific areas such as improving strength, weight loss, increasing flexibility, or overall fitness enhancement.

sportshall.text1: Our sports hall is a place where sport becomes a passion, and movement is a way to promote health and develop skills. It‚Äôs a space that offers excellent conditions for practicing various sports disciplines while inspiring an active lifestyle and friendly competition.
sportshall.text2: The sports hall is a facility with a court that can serve as a basketball, volleyball, badminton, or handball court. It‚Äôs a vibrant place that creates ideal conditions for both professional athletes and sports enthusiasts.

cards.text: At Muszynova, we warmly invite you to use our sports hall, where movement becomes a pleasure, and sport is not just physical activity but also a shared passion. Join us and discover the joy of staying active!

card1.text: Renting our sports hall guarantees professional infrastructure, flexible scheduling, and the support of experienced staff. We ensure that every event takes place in a friendly atmosphere, maintaining high standards of safety and comfort.

card2.text: Our hall is adapted for various sports disciplines such as basketball, volleyball, handball, and badminton. The flexibility of the space allows us to adjust the hall‚Äôs setup to specific needs, ensuring we can meet diverse expectations.

card3.text: Our sports hall was created to support physical activity and a healthy lifestyle among students. It‚Äôs possible to rent the hall for school classes or extracurricular activities.

minibowling.text1: Mini bowling is a fantastic form of entertainment that brings joy to both children and adults. Smaller pins, a shorter distance, but the same dose of fun ‚Äì all of this awaits mini bowling enthusiasts at our recreational center.
minibowling.text2: Mini bowling doesn‚Äôt require special skills, making it accessible to everyone. It‚Äôs also a great option for spending time with friends or family, encouraging healthy competition and shared fun.

cards.text: At Muszynova, we warmly invite you to our modern bowling alley, where a great atmosphere, modern facilities, and enthusiastic staff create the perfect conditions to enjoy this classic yet thrilling game. Let every throw be a reason for smiles and good fun!

card1.text: Bowling isn‚Äôt just a game for adults ‚Äì it‚Äôs also a fantastic form of entertainment for the little ones. Colorful pins catch children‚Äôs attention, creating a dynamic and joyful atmosphere. It‚Äôs great fun and a way to develop motor skills, precision, and teamwork with peers.

card2.text: Bowling is a perfect way to organize an active party that will delight both young children and older guests.

card3.text: We offer the opportunity to organize dynamic group activities. It‚Äôs a great option for companies, schools, or groups of friends looking for an engaging and team-building way to spend time together.

climbingwall.text1: The climbing wall is a perfect year-round activity. It inspires you to reach new heights and overcome your own limitations.
climbingwall.text2: Our climbing wall offers unforgettable experiences for climbers of all skill levels, from those just starting their climbing journey to seasoned enthusiasts.

cards.text: Safety is our priority. The solid construction of the wall and professional safety measures ensure that every climber can focus on reaching new heights without worrying about their safety. Our climbing wall offers a variety of routes tailored to the skills and experience of each climber.

card1.text: We invite you to join our group climbing wall classes. Our sessions are designed for various skill levels, adapting to the abilities and experience of each participant.

card2.text: Our experienced instructors will tailor the program to your skill level, personal goals, and learning pace. This allows you to focus on the specific aspects of climbing that matter most to you. It‚Äôs also an ideal option for those who value privacy and want to concentrate on their own progress.

card3.text: For schools, we offer educational classes where students can develop climbing skills under the watchful eye of experienced instructors. It‚Äôs a great opportunity to improve physical fitness, foster teamwork skills, and build confidence.

playground.text1: The children‚Äôs playroom is a space designed especially for the little ones, allowing them to play and spend active time in a safe environment. In this room, children have access to a variety of attractions that bring them joy and fun.
playground.text2: They can enjoy creative activities and other forms of entertainment. The playroom ensures that every child feels comfortable and has the opportunity to interact with their peers. It‚Äôs a perfect place where kids can develop their social skills, share with others, and collaborate in a group.

cards.header: You Train While Your Child Plays Under Our Caregivers‚Äô Supervision.
cards.text: Organize a birthday party at Muszynova. We provide excellent conditions and a range of attractions to make this day even more special. We offer spacious rooms perfect for hosting a birthday party, themed decorations, and entertainers. For the youngest, we provide animations, games, and contests. For older children, we have a wide range of attractions, such as mini bowling, a multimedia room, or a gaming zone.

card1.text: While you focus on an intense workout, we ensure safe and joyful playtime for your child. In a specially designed play area, under the supervision of a caregiver, your child can enjoy all the attractions and have a great time. We make sure every child feels comfortable and can actively spend time in a safe environment.

card2.text: Our entertainers will ensure the kids‚Äô time is filled with smiles. We organize creative games, contests, and arts and crafts activities tailored to the children‚Äôs age and interests. Safety and the well-being of the children are our priority, so you can rest assured that your child is under the constant care of qualified professionals who will take care of every detail to create a day full of positive experiences and joy.

card3.text: We are a new venue in our area offering a modern jungle gym for children. It‚Äôs a specially designed space where your little ones can explore, play, and develop their skills through interaction with elements tailored to their age. Our innovative jungle gym concept guarantees that children will have a unique opportunity to gain new skills through play in a safe and friendly environment.

squash.text1: Our squash court is a place where enthusiasts of this dynamic sport will find everything they need for an exciting game.
squash.text2: Equipped with a professional court, our space is designed for both experienced players and those just starting their squash journey. Come, dive into the fast-paced game of squash, and experience unforgettable emotions!

cards.text: Take on the challenge and try your hand at squash ‚Äì a dynamic and increasingly popular sport that originated from tennis. It‚Äôs an intense game that delivers an adrenaline rush while also improving mobility and fitness. It‚Äôs not only an effective conditioning workout but also a great opportunity to burn a lot of calories. By playing squash, you‚Äôre not just having fun ‚Äì you‚Äôre actively taking care of your health and physical condition.

card1.header: The Only One in the Area
card1.text: A unique squash court offering unforgettable experiences. The only space of its kind in Muszyna and the surrounding area!

card2.text: Book your squash court with just a few clicks through our online reservation system, saving you time.

card3.text: We invite you to use our squash court 7 days a week. Call us at 509 445 000 or book online.

bikerental.text1: Our bike rental is the perfect spot for outdoor activity enthusiasts. We offer a wide selection of bikes ‚Äì from city to mountain models ‚Äì for both children and adults.
bikerental.text2: Rent a bike and explore the picturesque trails of Muszyna and its surroundings, enjoying the beauty of nature. It‚Äôs a great way to stay active and enjoy leisure time, regardless of your experience!

cards.text: At Muszynova, we offer modern bikes in excellent condition, tailored to various trails and needs. Rent a bike and set off on an adventure ‚Äì from leisurely rides to challenging mountain trails. It‚Äôs not just a way to stay active, but also an opportunity to explore the region in an eco-friendly way!

card1.text: Discover Muszyna and its surroundings by bike ‚Äì we recommend the best trails for both beginner and advanced cyclists!

card2.text: Rent the perfect bike for you ‚Äì we have city bikes, mountain bikes, children‚Äôs bikes, and accessories like helmets and child seats.

card3.text: Our bike rental is open 7 days a week. Call us at 509 445 000 and start your cycling adventure!

gameroom.text1: At Muszynova Park, we wanted to create a place where you can compete and have fun with your friends. For fans of strategy and precision, we offer a professional billiards table and table tennis tables where you can improve your concentration and hand-eye coordination skills. Additionally, for those who enjoy fast-paced and thrilling games, we‚Äôve prepared a foosball table and an air hockey table.
gameroom.text2: A friendly atmosphere, modern equipment, and excellent entertainment ensure that the time spent at Muszynova is not only active but also incredibly enjoyable. We invite you to discover the fascinating world in a new way.

cards.text: In our game room, you‚Äôll find attractions that provide unforgettable moments, whether you‚Äôre playing solo or with friends and family. The professional billiards table offers the chance to compete and hone your skills, creating an atmosphere of sporting passion. Meanwhile, the foosball and air hockey tables immerse players in a world of excitement and fast-paced action. At Muszynova, we focus not only on physical activity but also on the overall enjoyment of your time at our recreational center. We invite you to explore the fascinating world of games and fun at Muszynova!

card1.text: Billiards is not only great fun but also an excellent way to develop concentration, precision, and strategic planning skills. Playing billiards allows you to build strategies and tactics. Regardless of your skill level, billiards is accessible to everyone while offering excitement for both amateurs and professionals.

card2.text: Foosball perfectly combines competition and fun, making every game an unforgettable experience for all participants.

card3.text: Air hockey, also known as table hockey, is an electrifying game that brings competition to a flat table surface. Played with special pucks and paddles, it offers fast-paced, reflex-driven gameplay and thrilling matches full of excitement.

multimediaroom.text1: The heart of our multimedia room is the latest PlayStation, where we provide access to the best games and entertainment for console gaming fans.
multimediaroom.text2: From thrilling adventures to exciting sports matches, there‚Äôs something for everyone. All of this can be enjoyed on comfortable bean bags, creating the perfect setting to immerse yourself in the world of virtual entertainment.

cards.text: Equipped with a PlayStation console and a virtual reality (VR) system, the multimedia room is a place where gamers can dive into fascinating virtual worlds. Whether someone prefers fast-paced action games or exploratory VR adventures, our room offers complete freedom of entertainment choice.

card1.text: We invite you to our modern multimedia room, where the world of PlayStation becomes a true adventure! The latest games, unforgettable emotions, and unparalleled experiences in virtual entertainment await you.

card2.text: We invite you to discover a new dimension of entertainment in our unique multimedia room with virtual reality (VR). It‚Äôs a place where the boundaries of reality blend with fantasy, creating unforgettable experiences.

card3.text: Plan a special birthday in our fantastic multimedia room, where every moment becomes an unforgettable adventure! You don‚Äôt have to worry about the organization ‚Äì our team will take care of every detail, so you can focus solely on enjoying the moment.

restaurantpage.header3: Organize with Us in a New Way
restaurantpage.text1: We focus on quality, on discovering flavors in a new way.
restaurantpage.text2: A restaurant offering a healthy and light menu. A concise selection with regional accents in our dishes brings you closer to Beskid cuisine. Light? Yes! Comfort food? We‚Äôve got pizza too. Something for everyone ‚Äì we cater to children, teens, and adults alike, inviting you for a drink.

card1.text: Muszynova Restaurant ‚Äì discover flavors and have great fun. We ensure the perfect combination: good times, good company, in a great place. We provide a comfortable venue for organizing parties and events ‚Äì family and social gatherings, anniversaries, corporate banquets, team-building events, communions, or weddings. Organize with us and discover a new quality.

card2.text: We have two comfortable rooms with a combined area of over 250 square meters. Both rooms can host two independent events simultaneously. Additionally, we have a sports hall available, where we organize sports events as well as exhibitions, shows, fairs, or concerts. It‚Äôs a place for you to discover.

card3.text: We invite business clients to organize conferences. Next to the restaurant, we have the Nova Room ‚Äì modern and air-conditioned. It features a projector displaying images up to 15 square meters. The equipment includes fully professional audio-video cabling, allowing for quick and efficient setup with external devices. Comfortable and modern.

card6.hours2: For holders of active passes with club cards - through the back entrance from the parking side

muszyna.text: Muszyna, a recognized spa town, is renowned for its numerous mineral water springs and bottling plants. It features mineral water tasting rooms, sanatoriums, swimming pools, and picturesque parks.

academy.text: A fully professional football academy with a modern and extensive sports facility.

muks.text: Collaboration with sports, governmental, local, and union authorities to provide members with optimal conditions for practicing sports.

galicya.text: OSW 'GALICYA' is the perfect place for family vacations, short weekend stays, as well as business meetings and work trips. It is a recently modernized hotel and conference facility that meets standards and is adapted for people with reduced mobility.

alpina.text: The Alpina Sport & Spa Recreation Center is the perfect place to unwind and recharge for further study or work.

kolejarz.text: Located in one of Poland‚Äôs most beautiful regions, this center offers comfortable accommodations and a rich sports and recreational program.

hospital.text: Located in Krynica-Zdr√≥j, the 20th Military Spa and Rehabilitation Hospital SPZOZ is 12 km from the Muszyna castle ruins and 33 km from Wierchomla Train Station.

artur.text: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day after day. Make today the first step toward achieving great goals.

activ.text: The Activ & Vital clinic was created for women at every stage of life, addressing issues from painful menstruation to perinatal therapy, and offering prevention and treatment for pelvic floor disorders.

relaks.text: Relax House 'On the Hill' in Muszyna is the perfect spot for a getaway in a spa-like setting, offering unique attractions for relaxation and rejuvenation.

revita.text: Nestled in the charming Muszyna valley, Revita Sanatorium blends the peace of nature with the healing power of local mineral waters.

aquapark.text: AquaPark Lipany, the newest thermal water park in Slovakia and the only one located in the mountains, lies in Lipany. Situated between Poprad and Pre≈°ov, it‚Äôs just 22 km from the Polish border and 40 km from Krynica-Zdr√≥j.

krynica.text: Located in the Beskid SƒÖdecki mountains in the Kryniczanka stream valley, Krynica is surrounded by Parkowa, Krzy≈ºowa, and Jasiennik hills. Within the Poprad Landscape Park, it serves as a gateway to nearby mountains.

hotel.text: Opened in 2010 in the scenic Muszyna-Z≈Çockie valley in the heart of Beskid SƒÖdecki, Hotel Muszyna*** is surrounded by the stunning landscapes of the Poprad Landscape Park.

reviews.text: Welcome to Muszynova ‚Äì a place where elegance meets exquisite taste. Enjoy delicious dishes, from juicy burgers to exquisite tartares and sweet desserts, paired with refreshing drinks. Our polite service and calm atmosphere will make every visit a moment of relaxation and pleasure. Spend a lovely afternoon with your loved ones and discover why our guests keep coming back for more!

1.name: Mariolka Pyrz
1.text: A very elegant restaurant. Delicious tartar, very good pizzas, and excellent desserts. A very nice place to relax. Highly recommend üëç

2.name: Amelia
2.text: The service was polite and always smiling, creating a nice atmosphere. The place is calm, perfect for relaxation. The burger was delicious and juicy, and the Aperol refreshing and perfectly balanced.

3.name: Beata Sƒôkowska
3.text: A great place to spend a lovely afternoon with friends. Very good drinks. Pleasant service.

4.name: AK K.
4.text: A beautiful and new playroom for small and medium-sized children, there‚Äôs even a nursing room and changing tables! Great value and a nice interior.

5.name: Bolek Lolek
5.text: Delicious schnitzel. Overall, a very well-maintained and clean place. Climbing wall, kids' room, game room, everything is new.

6.name: Monika Sam
6.text: A fantastic new place with friendly people, very nice service, and cleanliness throughout the building. The gym is well-equipped, and the trainers are helpful. Highly recommend. ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©

7.name: Magda Thomas
7.text: The latest local gem. Very nice, friendly atmosphere. Professional service, great instructors. Interesting offer and affordable prices. Definitely worth visiting regularly.

homepage.description: Discover Muszynova ‚Äì a recreational and sports park with a gym, climbing wall, squash, and more. Enjoy healthy dining at Muszynova Restaurant with Beskid flavors!

multimediaroom.description: Discover the modern Multimedia Room at Muszynova! Interactive games, virtual reality, and unforgettable entertainment for the whole family. See what awaits you!

climbingwall.description: Muszynova Climbing Wall in Muszyna ‚Äì safe group and individual classes, for schools. Climbing for kids and adults at all levels!

minibowling.description: Muszynova Mini Bowling in Muszyna ‚Äì fun for kids, adults, and groups. Birthdays, team-building, bowling in a friendly atmosphere ‚Äì check us out!

playroom.title: Muszynova Playroom - Muszyna
playroom.description: Muszynova Playroom in Muszyna ‚Äì for kids: jungle gym, animations, birthdays, games. Safe childcare during parents‚Äô training ‚Äì joy and development!

bikerental.description: Muszynova Bike Rental in Muszyna ‚Äì bikes for everyone, local trails, 7 days a week. Explore the region actively ‚Äì check our pricing!

sportshall.description: Muszynova Sports Hall in Muszyna ‚Äì rentals, team games: basketball, volleyball, badminton. Offer for schools and sports enthusiasts!

restaurant.description: Muszynova Restaurant in Muszyna ‚Äì regional Beskid cuisine, pizza, drinks, events, conferences. Delicious and modern ‚Äì visit us!

pricing.description: Discover the current pricing for services and products at Muszynova. Check the details and choose the best offer for you!

groupclasses.title: Muszynova Group Classes - Muszyna
groupclasses.description: Group classes at Muszynova ‚Äì fitness, climbing, squash, and more in Muszyna. Join group training and enjoy team activities!
